entry.title: King Canada KC-9050 - Inspection Camera Lcd Monitor
entry.summary:
Vendor: King Canada
Type: Cameras
Price: 135.41

[shortdesc]

Inspection camera with lcd monitor

  • Ideal for plumbing, automotive repair and construction for inspection of hard-to-reach or hard-to-see areas
  • 9mm diameter x 39” flexible-obedient camera probe impervious to coolant, water, dust and oil (IP67 standards)
  • 2.4” diagonal TFT-LCD color monitor Camera and LCD monitor are powered by 4 AA batteries
  • LED lights inside the camera probe tip illuminate dark spaces
  • Kit comes with 3 accessory tools (45° mirror, magnetic pick-up, pick-up hook) and 4 AA batteries
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand King Canada
    Product Type Cameras

entry.title: King Canada KC-9200 - Inspection Camera Wireless Recordable Lcd Monitor
entry.summary:
Vendor: King Canada
Type: Cameras
Price: 267.97

[shortdesc]

Wireless inspection camera with recordable LCD monitor

  • Wireless inspection camera with recordable LCD monitor Ideal for plumbing, automotive repair and construction for inspection of hard-to-reach or hard-to-see areas
  • 9mm diameter x 39” flexible-obedient camera probe impervious to coolant, water, dust and oil (IP67 standards) 10mm diameter (19mm Max) x 39” probe extension extends probe length up to 78”
  • Camera is powered by 4 AA batteries, LCD monitor is powered by a rechargeable Li-ion battery LED lights inside the camera probe tip illuminate dark spaces
  • View results immediately, record video or capture still photos with 4GB
  • Micro SD memory card
  • Kit comes with camera handle, flexible camera probe, camera probe extension, 3.5” TFT-LCD wireless color monitor, monitor Li-ion charger, 3 accessory tools (45° mirror, magnetic pick-up, pick-up hook), USB and Video cables, 4GB SD memory card and 4 AA batteries
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand King Canada
    Product Type Cameras
